sn35.88:1.1: Atha kho ayasma punno yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma punno bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.88:1.2: “sadhu me, bhante, bhagava sankhittena dhammam desetu, yamaham bhagavato dhammam sutva eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn35.88:2.1: “Santi kho, punna, cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.88:2.2: Tance bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati.
sn35.88:2.3: Tassa tam abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaya titthato uppajjati nandi.
sn35.88:2.6: santi kho, punna, manovinneyya dhamma ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.88:2.7: Tance bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosaya titthati.
sn35.88:2.8: Tassa tam abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosaya titthato uppajjati nandi.
sn35.88:3.1: Santi kho, punna, cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.88:3.2: Tance bhikkhu nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati, tassa tam anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaya titthato nirujjhati nandi.
sn35.88:3.4: santi kho, punna, manovinneyya dhamma ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.88:3.5: Tance bhikkhu nabhinandati nabhivadati najjhosaya titthati, tassa tam anabhinandato anabhivadato anajjhosaya titthato nirujjhati nandi.
sn35.88:4.1: Imina tvam, punna, maya sankhittena ovadena ovadito katamasmim janapade viharissasi”ti?
sn35.88:4.2: “Atthi, bhante, sunaparanto nama janapado, tatthaham viharissami”ti.
sn35.88:5.3: Sace tam, punna, sunaparantaka manussa akkosissanti paribhasissanti, tatra te, punna, kinti bhavissati”ti?
sn35.88:6.1: “Sace mam, bhante, sunaparantaka manussa akkosissanti paribhasissanti, tatra me evam bhavissati:
sn35.88:6.2: ‘bhaddaka vatime sunaparantaka manussa, subhaddaka vatime sunaparantaka manussa, yam me nayime panina paharam denti’ti.
sn35.88:7.1: “Sace pana te, punna, sunaparantaka manussa panina paharam dassanti, tatra pana te, punna, kinti bhavissati”ti?
sn35.88:8.1: “Sace me, bhante, sunaparantaka manussa panina paharam dassanti, tatra me evam bhavissati:
sn35.88:8.2: ‘bhaddaka vatime sunaparantaka manussa, subhaddaka vatime sunaparantaka manussa, yam me nayime ledduna paharam denti’ti.
sn35.88:9.1: “Sace pana te, punna, sunaparantaka manussa ledduna paharam dassanti, tatra pana te, punna, kinti bhavissati”ti?
sn35.88:10.1: “Sace me, bhante, sunaparantaka manussa ledduna paharam dassanti, tatra me evam bhavissati:
sn35.88:10.2: ‘bhaddaka vatime sunaparantaka manussa, subhaddaka vatime sunaparantaka manussa, yam me nayime dandena paharam denti’ti.
sn35.88:11.1: “Sace pana punna, sunaparantaka manussa dandena paharam dassanti, tatra pana te, punna, kinti bhavissati”ti?
sn35.88:12.1: “Sace me, bhante, sunaparantaka manussa dandena paharam dassanti, tatra me evam bhavissati:
sn35.88:12.2: ‘bhaddaka vatime sunaparantaka manussa, subhaddaka vatime sunaparantaka manussa, yam me nayime satthena paharam denti’ti.
sn35.88:13.1: “Sace pana te, punna, sunaparantaka manussa satthena paharam dassanti, tatra pana te, punna, kinti bhavissati”ti?
sn35.88:14.1: “Sace me, bhante, sunaparantaka manussa satthena paharam dassanti, tatra me evam bhavissati:
sn35.88:14.2: ‘bhaddaka vatime sunaparantaka manussa, subhaddaka vatime sunaparantaka manussa, yam mam nayime tinhena satthena jivita voropenti’ti.
sn35.88:15.1: “Sace pana tam, punna, sunaparantaka manussa tinhena satthena jivita voropessanti, tatra pana te, punna, kinti bhavissati”ti?
sn35.88:16.1: “Sace mam, bhante, sunaparantaka manussa tinhena satthena jivita voropessanti, tatra me evam bhavissati:
sn35.88:16.2: ‘santi kho tassa bhagavato savaka kayena ca jivitena ca attiyamana harayamana jigucchamana satthaharakam pariyesanti, tam me idam apariyitthanneva satthaharakam laddhan’ti.
sn35.88:17.2: Sakkhissasi kho tvam, punna, imina damupasamena samannagato sunaparantasmim janapade vatthum.
sn35.88:18.1: Atha kho ayasma punno bhagavato vacanam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva senasanam samsametva pattacivaramadaya yena sunaparanto janapado tena carikam pakkami.
sn35.88:18.2: Anupubbena carikam caramano yena sunaparanto janapado tadavasari.
sn35.88:18.3: Tatra sudam ayasma punno sunaparantasmim janapade viharati.
sn35.88:18.4: Atha kho ayasma punno tenevantaravassena pancamattani upasakasatani pativedesi.
sn35.88:19.1: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu …pe… ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn35.88:19.2: “yo so, bhante, punno nama kulaputto bhagavata sankhittena ovadena ovadito, so kalankato.
sn35.88:20.1: “Pandito, bhikkhave, punno kulaputto, paccapadi dhammassanudhammam, na ca mam dhammadhikaranam vihesesi.
